About Us

Welcome to our Animal Management System project developed for INFT 2202. Our aim is to create a user-friendly platform that allows users to add, view, and manage animal-related data effectively.

This project integrates modern web development technologies including HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript with modular design patterns to ensure a responsive and dynamic user experience.

Our team is dedicated to continuous improvement and user-centered development practices. We appreciate your visit and support!
